title: Figma UI UX Design Tutorial (Basic To Advance)
description: Learn Figma UI/UX design from basics to advanced level with hands-on projects.
instructor: John Doe is a seasoned UI/UX designer with over 10 years of experience in the industry. He has worked for various companies, designing user interfaces and experiences for websites, mobile apps, and software applications.

faqs.question: Do I need any prior knowledge of design?
faqs.answer: No prior knowledge is required. This course is designed for beginners as well as experienced designers.

faqs.question: Will I get a certificate after completing the course?
faqs.answer: Yes, you will receive a certificate of completion after successfully finishing the course.
